# Low Fidelity and High Fidelity Virtual Reality Headsets

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: 202206385/A
* Publication Date: November 4, 2024
* Closing Date and Time: December 2, 2024, 14:00 HNE
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 16, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 15, 2026

## Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for Low Fidelity and High Fidelity Virtual Reality Headsets. The requirement is as follows:

* 10 Low Fidelity Virtual Reality Headsets
* 3 High Fidelity Virtual Reality Headsets

Bidders may submit a bid for either Stream A (Low Fidelity) or Stream B (High Fidelity) or both. The RCMP intends to award up to two (2) contracts as a result of this solicitation.

Optional units may be ordered in accordance with the Basis of Payment section of the tender documents.

## Security Requirements

There are no security requirements applicable to this solicitation.

## Basis of Selection

Tenders will be evaluated based on Mandatory Technical Criteria. The responsive bid providing both Streams of Virtual Reality Headsets (Stream A - Low Fidelity and Stream B - High Fidelity) in one proposal and has the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of contract. If no bid is able to fulfill the whole requirement (both Stream A and Stream B), the responsive bid of each Stream (A and B) with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of contract.

## Tender Documents

The tender documents are available for download from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.
